full_summary:
### **Tender Title:** NSN 1355-01-4063360 Weight, Jettison, Torpedo

#### Brief Description:
The Royal Canadian Navy has a requirement for 1200 Torpedoes (HOTTORP 2-11-E or Raytheon's 9859116 models). The Government of Canada invites bids from qualified suppliers to provide these goods.

### **Tender Details:**
*   **Reference Number:** CB-5273-79974006
*   **Solicitation Number:** W8482-241566/A
*   **Publication Date:** May 05, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** June 05, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### **Delivery and Requirements:**

Please deliver the Torpedoes to Canadian Forces Base Rocky Point, Victoria, British Columbia. Bidders proposing an Equivalent or Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number, and the NCAGE they are offering.

### **Submission and Evaluation Criteria:**

*   **Quote submission:** Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
*   **Evaluation criteria:** The lowest price will be the primary evaluation criterion.
*   **Delivery of documents:** The documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### **Contracting Entity Information:**

National Defence (Procurement and Contracting)

101 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
Phone: (555) 555-5555
Email: [christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca)

### **Attachments:**

*   RFP Document (English): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5273/w8482-241566---rfp---en.pdf>
*   RFP Document (French): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5273/w8482-241566---rfp---fr.pdf>

### **Notice URL:**
None
